about.p1: I'm a software engineer who loves to learn and adapts fast to any project or technology. I'm resilient and persevere to deliver in complex environments.
about.p2: Core stack: Java, Spring Boot, Angular. Comfortable with SQL/NoSQL. Experience with Node.js and DevOps (CI/CD, Docker, Kubernetes) with a focus on observability and performance.
about.p3: Proven learning speed and adaptability: moved to Node.js at Proximus and contributed across the stack. At ARHS Group Part of Accenture, consulting for the European Commission on CBAM, I own backend and frontend modules, improve CI/CD, and help the team move forward—always doing everything in my power to get the job done.

xp-proximus-intern.title: Full-Stack Developer Intern (Java/Angular)
xp-proximus-intern.summary: Learned fast in a large microservices project and delivered Java/Angular features while collaborating in English with an international team.

xp-proximus-node.title: Full-Stack Developer (Node.js webshop)
xp-proximus-node.summary: Adapted quickly to a new Node.js stack and shipped end‑to‑end features for the new webshop with cross‑functional teams.

xp-arhs-carbon.title: Junior Software Engineer — European Commission (CBAM)
xp-arhs-carbon.summary: Took ownership of key modules (backend and Angular), improved CI/CD, and supported performance testing for the European Commission CBAM project.

Hero.title: Adaptable, fast‑learning software engineer. Resilient and persevering.
Hero.subtitle: Java • Spring Boot • Angular • Node.js • DevOps
